section.p: This is a bug fix to release 4.1.0.

ul.li: Aggregate functions (MIN, MAX, AVG, COUNT etc) no longer generate an internal exception.
Minor improvements to the installation documentation.

section.p: This is the first release of ICAT4 which is meant to be approaching production quality.

ul.li:
More changes to the API - too numerous to list here providing
support for pluggable authn,
support for rule based authz,
support for notifications and
a powerful search mechanism
More regular schema with simple provenance mechanism

section.p: Technology preview release - not for production use

ul.li: Changed the JPA provider from TopLink to EclipseLink
